Text:
Child rearing is a practical mission and the results and ONLY results caunts. Theory -  even the most elegant and compelling -  must be thrown away if we see the bad results of applying them.
Results of Summerhill's theories are catastrophic.Yes catastrophic.

Τhanks for this incredible upload!
Raising up children without physical or psychological violence is a predicament if society is to advance genuinely ...
And NO! The results of summerhill were not catastrophic! Far from it! They were promising and daring like the human freedom!
What is REALLY catastrophic is the obsession of some people to raise children in an oppressive manner...
Please upload the books of Wilhelm Reich (Friend of Neil and Summerhill) if you have them!
